demo.title: Register for a FREE Demo Lesson

info.general: Register for a FREE demo lesson specially built for your child to make his first steps into programming. Afterwards, an interactive discussion is held in order to tell you more about what we do and answer all your questions.
when: Select the date you prefer in the sign-up form
long: 1 hour, including Q&A session with parents at the end

demo-success.title: Thank you for your registration
demo-success.subtitle: You will receive a confirmation email soon! We look forward to meeting you!

classlist.private: At the moment these classes are only available privately. Please get in touch with us for any such demands, we will be more than happy to assist you!
classlist.none: Sorry, no such classes are available at this time. Please check again later or contact us if you think this is a mistake.
classlist.choose: Please choose a group that suits you and register your child.
classlist.description: Learn to code from #0 to #1 years old, in
